# Copilot Skills

This folder contains reusable, repo-specific Skills for agents working in this workspace.

## Skills

- `spec-unit-workflow/`
  - Keep all work organized into `spec/NNN-kebab-case/` units with `00-readme.md`, `01-plan.md`, `02-execution.md`.

- `phase0-compose-skeleton/`
  - Scaffold/validate the Phase 0 walking skeleton: Compose + web + api + agent + db, with basic health checks.

- `websocket-envelope-transport/`
  - Maintain the JSON-envelope WebSocket protocol and API→agent forwarding for realtime chat.

- `observability-skeleton-stack/`
  - Stand up and verify the “real skeleton” observability stack: Prometheus/Grafana/Loki/Tempo + OTel Collector and Python instrumentation.
